headline.main: Lack of Deep Sleep Tied to Hypertension

docs.abstract: A new study is one of the first to find that the quality of your nightly slumber, and not simply the total duration of it, can play a direct role in the odds of developing high blood pressure.
docs.snippet: A new study is one of the first to find that the quality of your nightly slumber, and not simply the total duration of it, can play a direct role in the odds of developing high blood pressure.

headline.main: Lack of Deep Sleep Tied to Hypertension

docs.abstract: A new study is one of the first to find that the quality of your nightly slumber, and not simply the total duration of it, can play a direct role in the odds of developing high blood pressure.
docs.lead_paragraph: Men who get the least deep sleep each night have a higher risk of hypertension, new research shows.
docs.snippet: A new study is one of the first to find that the quality of your nightly slumber, and not simply the total duration of it, can play a direct role in the odds of developing high blood pressure.

headline.seo: Billie Jean King Raises Arthritis Awareness - Advertising
headline.print_headline: On the Move, Athletically, Against Arthritis
headline.main: On the Move, Athletically, Against Arthritis

docs.lead_paragraph: The Arthritis Foundation is urging people to use exercise as a weapon against pain.
docs.snippet: The Arthritis Foundation is urging people to use exercise as a weapon against pain.
